mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMORY_FRAGMENTS ( TOKENS, REQUEST_MESSAGE_JSON, RESPONSE_MESSAGE_JSON, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{tokens}, #{requestMessageJson}, #{responseMessageJson}, strftime('%s', 'now') || substr(strftime('%f', 'now'), 4), strftime('%s', 'now') || substr(strftime('%f', 'now'), 4) )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMORY_FRAGMENTS WHERE FRAGMENT_ID < #{maxFragmentId} ORDER BY FRAGMENT_ID DESC LIMIT #{limit}
